# trps

<!-- badges: start -->
[![Codecov test coverage](https://codecov.io/gh/benjaminhlina/trps/graph/badge.svg)](https://app.codecov.io/gh/benjaminhlina/trps)
<!-- badges: end -->

{trps} (pronounced trips) is a package that leverages {brms} to create Bayesian estimates of trophic position for different species using stable isotope data. 

## Installation

You can install the development version of {trps} using the following:

``` r
devtools::install_github("benjaminhlina/trps")
library(trps)
```
